page_subtitle: Manage your mistake data, system settings, and backups
export_description: Export all your mistake data, including images and chat history, as well as system settings.
json_format_description: Includes all mistake data, images (Base64 encoded), chat history, and system settings. Recommended for full backup and migration.
csv_format_description: Includes only the text content of mistakes (question, OCR text, tags, etc.). Suitable for quick viewing or importing into other spreadsheet tools.
import_description: Import mistake data and system settings from a backup file. Importing will overwrite existing data, please proceed with caution.
settings_description: Backup and restore your API configurations, model assignments, and general settings separately.
export_settings_description: Export API configurations, model assignments, and general settings.
import_settings_description: Import system settings from a backup file. Importing will overwrite existing settings.
settings_tip_1: Settings import/export only handles API configurations, model assignments, and general settings, not mistake data.
settings_tip_2: After importing settings, you may need to restart the application for changes to take full effect.
settings_tip_3: Before importing settings, it is recommended to export your current settings as a backup.
danger_description: This area contains operations that may lead to data loss. Please read carefully and confirm before proceeding.
usage_tip_1: Regularly back up your data to prevent accidental loss.
usage_tip_2: Before importing data, ensure the integrity and compatibility of the backup file.
usage_tip_3: Clearing data is irreversible, please proceed with extreme caution.
usage_tip_4: JSON format backup includes all data, CSV format only includes text content.
please_select_settings_file: Please select a settings backup file.
csv_format_error: CSV file format error, please ensure correct header row.
csv_no_valid_data: No valid mistake data found in CSV file.
confirm_import: Are you sure you want to import {{count}} mistake data entries?
danger_confirm_message: Warning: This operation will permanently delete all mistake data, including images, chat history, and all related settings. This operation is irreversible! Are you sure you want to continue?
wait_confirm_message: Please calm down for three seconds. Are you really sure you want to clear all data?
countdown_message: You have {{seconds}} seconds left to change your mind...
final_confirm_message: To confirm you really want to clear all data, please enter the last five digits of the current time (e.g.: {{currentTime}}): {{timeSlice}}
database_already_empty: Database is already empty, no need to clear.
batch_clear_success: Successfully cleared {{count}} mistake data entries in batch.
individual_clear_success: Successfully cleared {{count}} mistake data entries individually.
console_backup_images_processing: Starting image backup processing, mistake count:
confirm_restore_from_zip: Confirm restore from backup? This will overwrite existing data.
import_warning_message: Importing will overwrite all current data. Current data will be automatically backed up before import, but we recommend manually exporting a backup first.
old_version_backup_note: This is an old version backup file, missing some metadata. It is recommended to re-export backup using the latest version.
import_progress_note: Do not close the window or exit the application, otherwise data may be corrupted.
confirm_cancel_import: Import is in progress, are you sure you want to cancel?

vector_index.auto_description: LanceDB automatically maintains vector and full-text indexes. Use "Refresh Status" to fetch the latest statistics.
vector_index.auto_hint: LanceDB vector engine is active. The backend keeps indexes up to date automatically.
vector_index.performance_hint: Run maintenance tasks (compact, prune, reindex) to keep query performance stable.
vector_index.confirm_twice_hint: Click again within 8 seconds to confirm. {{warning}}
vector_index.lance_no_manual_build: Using LanceDB vector backend, no manual index building required.
vector_index.build_error: Failed to build vector index, please retry or check logs.
vector_index.lance_no_manual_rebuild: Using LanceDB vector backend, no index rebuild required.
vector_index.rebuild_confirm: Rebuilding the index will clear existing data and rebuild.
vector_index.rebuild_error: Failed to rebuild vector index, please retry or check logs.

actions.export_description: Export your data backup, including mistakes, images and settings
actions.import_description: Restore data from backup file, will overwrite existing content
actions.clear_data_description: Permanently delete all data (cannot be recovered)

dialogs.invalid_zip: Please select a .zip format backup file
dialogs.pick_backup_destination: Choose a destination folder for the exported backup

statistics_section_subtitle: View overall data overview and trends
management_section_subtitle: Manage your backups, import/export, and system maintenance
restore_complete: Data restored successfully! You can continue using the app, or manually restart later to fully refresh the environment.

lance_optimize.confirm:
Lance optimization will merge fragmented files, clean old versions, and rebuild indexes. This may take 1-5 minutes, during which the database remains usable.

Recommended to run periodically to improve query performance and reduce backup time.

Continue?
lance_optimize.success:
Lance optimization complete!

Optimized tables: {{tables}}
Duration: {{duration}}ms

Fragmented files merged, query performance and backup speed improved.

vector_build.lance_no_need: Using LanceDB vector backend, no manual index building required.
vector_build.error: Failed to build vector index, please check console for errors

vector_rebuild.lance_no_need: Using LanceDB vector backend, no index rebuild required.
vector_rebuild.confirm: Rebuilding index will clear existing data and rebuild. Continue?
vector_rebuild.error: Failed to rebuild vector index, please check console for errors

clear_data.success_mobile: All database files deleted! Please exit and reopen the app to complete initialization.
clear_data.success_desktop: All database files deleted! App will restart in 3 seconds...
clear_data.no_files: No database files found to delete
clear_data.complete_mobile: Database deletion complete! Please exit and reopen the app to complete initialization.
clear_data.complete_desktop: Database deletion complete! App will restart in 3 seconds...
clear_data.error: Failed to clear data, please check console logs
clear_data.confirm_text_error: Incorrect confirmation text, please enter "Clear all databases"

backup_test.success: Backup system test passed! Data integrity: {{score}}%
backup_test.title: Backup System Test
backup_test.description: Run full automated backup/restore flow test using test slots C/D, verify data integrity

header.title: Data Management
header.subtitle: Manage your data backups and system settings

errors.backup_id_not_resolved: Backup completed but backup_id could not be resolved
errors.zip_import_backup_id_not_resolved: ZIP import completed but backup_id could not be resolved

settings_tab.migrated: Backup settings have been migrated to the data governance system.
settings_tab.migrated_hint: Please use "Settings → Data Governance" for backup configuration.

data_space.title: Data Space (A/B)
data_space.description: Uses dual-space (slotA/slotB) logic. Import backups write to the inactive space, and after restart, the app switches to the new space to avoid conflicts.

integrity.title: Database Integrity
integrity.description: When anomalies occur, running an integrity check can help quickly identify potential issues.
integrity.passed: Integrity check passed ({{count}} databases all healthy)
integrity.issues: Integrity check found issues: {{databases}} have abnormal status

clear_section.title: Data Cleanup
clear_section.description: This operation will delete all data, please proceed with caution.

clear_dialog.step0_desc_items:
including:
• All learning data
• Knowledge graph data
• Knowledge base data (RAG)
• Analysis data
• Orphaned image files
clear_dialog.step0_desc_advice: It is recommended to create a backup first.
clear_dialog.step1_hint: You can cancel during this time.
clear_dialog.step2_description: Please enter the following confirmation text to continue:
clear_dialog.step2_placeholder: Please enter the text above here

backup_import.best_effort_mode: Best Effort Mode (ignore some file errors, try to recover)
backup_import.error_invalid_path: Parameter error: cannot recognize backup file path
backup_import.error_file_not_found: Backup file not found or path invalid
backup_import.error_missing_metadata: Backup file missing metadata, may be old version format
backup_import.error_permission_denied: Permission denied: cannot access backup file

sync_settings.title: Sync Settings
sync_settings.description: Manage data sync, conflict detection, and resolution
sync_settings.resolve_partial: Some conflicts could not be resolved
sync_settings.sync_actions_description: Choose a sync direction to synchronize data
sync_settings.conflict_description: Detect and resolve data conflicts between local and cloud

backup_settings.title: Local Backup
backup_settings.description: Configure backup directory and auto-backup strategy
backup_settings.directory_desc: Choose where to store backup files. Leave empty to use default directory.
backup_settings.max_backup_desc: Automatically delete oldest backups when exceeding this limit
backup_settings.slim_backup_desc: Only backup databases and settings, skip images, documents, and knowledge base. Reduces backup time and storage usage.
backup_settings.tiered_desc: Select backup scope by data tier; leave empty for full backup
backup_settings.tiered_hint: Tiered backup will automatically disable slim backup
backup_settings.tiered_disable_slim: Tiered backup enabled; slim backup has been disabled

governance.pending_migrations_next_step: Pending migrations detected — restart app to complete upgrade
governance.pending_migrations_guidance: Database schema upgrades run automatically at startup. Please close and reopen the app, then return here to confirm.
governance.migration_incomplete_guidance: Try: 1) Restart the app to retry; 2) Ensure sufficient disk space; 3) If it still fails, check the Audit tab for details or contact support.
governance.listener_migration_failed_message: Database migration failed: {{error}}. The app runs in degraded mode and some features may be unavailable. Check your data or contact support.
governance.listener_migration_success_message: Database upgraded to version {{version}} with {{count}} migrations applied
governance.listener_pending_migration_warning: {{count}} database migrations are pending. Restart the app to complete migration.
governance.scan_select_asset_types_first: Select asset types to scan first
governance.asset_type_filter_unsupported: Select asset types to back up. Leave empty to include all assets in the selected tiers.
governance.asset_type_filter_unsupported_hint: Select asset types to back up. Leave empty to include all assets in the selected tiers.
governance.tiered_backup_select_tier_first: Select at least one backup tier
governance.cloud_sync_not_configured_desc: Configure cloud storage (WebDAV/S3) before syncing or detecting conflicts.
governance.sync_already_running: A sync task is already running

cache.title: Media cache
cache.description: Manage caches generated by PDF/image preprocessing
cache.total_size_desc: Includes preview images, compressed cache, and vector index
cache.vector_index_warning: After clearing the vector index, smart search and RAG recall will be unavailable until you rebuild the index.

options.pdf_preview_desc: PDF pages will be re-rendered when reopened
options.compressed_images_desc: Images will be recompressed when sending messages
options.vector_index_desc: ⚠️ You must rebuild vector indexes for all resources

governance.debug_panel_desc: Simulate various migration states to debug toast notifications and repair flow UI
governance.debug_slot_test_title: Test-slot migration checks (won't affect current data)
governance.debug_run_slot_c_test: Run Slot C Empty DB Test
governance.debug_run_slot_d_test: Run Slot D Clone DB Test
governance.debug_slot_c_test_success: Slot C empty-db migration test completed
governance.debug_slot_c_test_failed: Slot C empty-db migration test failed, copy diagnostics and contact developers
governance.debug_slot_d_test_success: Slot D clone-db migration test completed
governance.debug_slot_d_test_failed: Slot D clone-db migration test failed, copy diagnostics and contact developers
governance.debug_slot_test_error_action: Execution failed: {{error}}. Please copy diagnostics for developers, then retry.
governance.debug_slot_no_log: No logs yet. Run a test first.
governance.debug_warning_details: vfs has 1 pending migration (current: v20260206, target: v20260207)
governance.debug_info_details: Successfully applied 3 migrations, global version: v20260207
governance.debug_flow_warning_details: Detected schema inconsistency, running repair migration
governance.debug_flow_success_details: All migrations executed successfully, database is healthy
governance.debug_toast_behavior_warning_info: Warning / Info: auto-dismiss after 8s, paused on hover
governance.debug_toast_behavior_error: Error: does not auto-dismiss, must be closed manually or click 'dismiss'
governance.debug_toast_behavior_flow: Simulated repair flow: Error → 2.5s → Warning → 2.5s → Info → 3s → Clear
governance.title: Data Governance
governance.description: Manage database migrations, backups, sync, and audit logs
governance.database_status_desc: Version and health status of each database
governance.migration_tab_desc: Review schema upgrade progress and errors
governance.migration_last_error_action: Restart the app or check disk space, then review details in the Audit tab.
governance.audit_degraded_desc: Audit log writes failed. Audit data may be out of sync.
governance.audit_degraded_action: Check disk space/permissions, restart the app, then confirm in the Audit tab.
governance.export_backup_desc: Backup all data and export as ZIP
governance.tiered_backup_desc: Select data tiers to back up by priority
governance.include_assets_desc: Back up images, documents, videos, and other large files
governance.delete_warning: This backup cannot be recovered after deletion.
governance.export_warning: A ZIP file will be created with compression level {{level}}.
governance.restore_warning: Restore will replace current data. A pre-restore backup will be created automatically.
governance.restore_incremental_not_supported: Incremental backups cannot be restored directly yet. Please choose a full backup or merge first.
governance.conflicts_count: Found {{count}} database conflicts and {{records}} record conflicts
governance.conflict_impact_hint: 'Keep Local' discards cloud changes; 'Use Cloud' overwrites local edits; 'Keep Latest' auto-selects by timestamp; 'Manual' defers resolution for review.
governance.restore_success_restart: Restore successful. Restart the app to ensure data is fully loaded.
governance.backup_already_running: A backup task is already running
governance.restore_insufficient_space: Insufficient disk space: {{required}} GB needed, {{available}} GB available. Please free up disk space and try again.
governance.restore_complete_desc: Data has been successfully restored. Restart the app to ensure all data is loaded correctly.
governance.restore_save_work_warning: Please save any unsaved work before restarting.
governance.verify_result_passed: Backup verification passed. All databases are intact.
governance.verify_result_failed: Backup verification found issues. Some databases may be corrupted.
governance.verify_overall_fail: Checksum mismatch or database corruption detected

backup_tier_desc.core: Chat history (chat_v2.db), virtual filesystem (vfs.db), main database (cards/settings)
backup_tier_desc.important: Includes P0 + LLM usage stats (llm_usage.db), note attachments (notes_assets/)
backup_tier_desc.rebuildable: Includes P0-P1 + vector indexes (lance/), recoverable via re-indexing
backup_tier_desc.large_assets: Includes P0-P2 + images/documents/videos and other media files

governance.backup_settings_desc: Configure automatic backup and retention policies
governance.auto_backup_desc: Automatically create backups at regular intervals
governance.max_backup_count_desc: Oldest backups are automatically deleted when the limit is exceeded (1–100)
governance.slim_backup_desc: Only back up databases and settings; skip images, knowledge base, and other large files
governance.auto_verify_failed_action: Backup completed but verification failed. Check the Audit tab and run a new backup.
governance.maintenance_backup: Backup in progress, do not close the app
governance.maintenance_export: Exporting data, do not close the app
governance.maintenance_import: Importing data, do not close the app
governance.maintenance_restore: Restoring data, do not close the app
governance.maintenance_sync: Syncing data, do not close the app
